title: WHYS: Gay parenting: Dolce & Gabbana vs Elton John
teaser: Designers Dolce & Gabbana have said they oppose gay adoptions. In an interview they said "I call children of chemistry, synthetic children. Rented uterus, semen chosen from a catalogue." Elton John has waded in calling on people to boycott the fashion label. We speak to members of the gay community to hear their reaction, including a gay woman who is currently pregnant and a woman who was brought up by her gay father.
